marklogic.body:
Are representatives of the pharmaceutical and alcohol industries on this list?
Does it say how much they pay Camoron to lie about cannabis, and make sure it stays illegal?
On a slightly different subject, considering the publication of the government's alcohol strategy today, and the recentÂ disgusting behaviour of MP Eric Joyce, isn't it about time they closed the 9 parliamentary bars, to enable members to go to work sober?
Joyce got Off with slapped wrists, whereas Winston Matthews, a middle-aged man who grew cannabis to treat his severe Back pain, and harmed no-one, is rotting in prison for 16 months.
Outrageous.
